column1: https://homestars.com/on/gormley/surveyors,2,https://homestars.com/on/gormley/surveyors,Surveyors,2929214,http://rssurveyinglimited.ca,/companies/2929214-rs-surveying-ltd?searched_category_id=440&service_area=2192857,"RS Surveying Limited is a licensed Land Surveyors Practicing Cadastral Surveying Services across the province of Ontario. The ‘Association of Ontario Land Surveyors’ has granted RS Surveying Ltd. the ‘Certificate of Authorisation' to provide Cadastral Surveying Services to the Public in 2020.RS Surveying Limited, is headed by Managing Surveyor Shajeeshane (Shane) Rajakulendran who has 14 years of experience, in the field of surveying in Ontario.

Our Clients are Architects, Developers, Contractors, Engineers, Planners, Realtors, Lawyers, private House Owner-Builders, Contractors and Government Agencies. Our mechanism is to provide project-responsive services to our clients.

We see our future in growing as a Land Surveying and Geomatics Solution Providers the leading industries in Ontario. The firm’s capacities will be therefore directed towards advanced instrumentation application, advanced software acquisition and in-house technical staff development.
For A Technical and Delivery Capacity Assessment   Please contact us at 905-554-1021.

column2: Easement and Right of way verification
Municipal Application (Ex: Severance Application, Variance Application etc.)
Site Grading Plan and Grading Certificate
Reference Plan for First application process
Calculated Draft Plan and Site Statics
Establish Horizontal and Vertical Control Network
Site servicing layout (sewer, water main, etc.)
